message.entry: When PilotCarrierIndices is a 3-D array, its last dimension size must be no greater than 64.
The pilot subcarrier indices per symbol across all the transmit antennas must be mutually distinct.
CyclicPrefixLength must be a scalar or a row vector of length equal to NumSymbols, with values between 0 and FFTLength, inclusive.
The values of NumGuardBandCarriers must be smaller than half of FFTLength.
PilotCarrierIndices must have the first dimension size less than FFTLength, the second dimension size equal to 1 or NumSymbols, with values in [{0}, {1}] or [{2}, {3}].
When PilotCarrierIndices is a 3-D array, its third dimension size must be equal to NumTransmitAntennas.
The summation of guard band, null and pilot subcarriers per symbol must be smaller than FFTLength.
WindowLength must be smaller than or equal to the minimum of CyclicPrefixLength.
Code generation for the showResourceMapping method is not supported.
The freqIndex input to the showResourceMapping method must be a 1 x 2 row vector such that freqIndex(2)=freqIndex(1)+FFTLength-1.
The txIndex input to the showResourceMapping method must have 8 or less unique elements.
The txIndex input to the showResourceMapping method is ignored as all the transmit antennas have the same subcarrier mapping.
Specify the txIndex input to show up to 8 subcarrier mapping plots for different transmit antennas at one time.
